sentence_english: The experiment conducted at the university revealed surprising results about human behavior in stressful situations.
sentence_portuguese: O experimento realizado na universidade revelou resultados surpreendentes sobre o comportamento humano em situações de stress.

sentence_english: The expression 'as in' is often used to introduce examples or comparisons in Portuguese.

sentence_english: The 'ship-first' approach is essential for optimizing logistics in maritime cargo transport.

sentence_english: It is important to be aware of the pitfalls that may arise along the path to professional success.

sentence_english: Pushing the boundaries of knowledge is essential for the progress of science and technology.

sentence_english: The rubber stamp we use in the company is essential for authenticating official documents and ensuring their validity.

sentence_english: Ideation is a crucial process for developing innovative solutions in any business area.

sentence_english: Constant practice is the key to becoming better at any skill we wish to develop.

sentence_english: In the summer, I enjoy relaxing on a terrace with a nice cold draft beer.
sentence_portuguese: No verão, gosto de relaxar numa esplanada com uma cerveja de pressão bem gelada.

sentence_english: It is essential to learn to cope with the possibility of losing, as it is part of life and personal growth.
sentence_portuguese: É fundamental aprender a lidar com a possibilidade de perder, pois faz parte da vida e do crescimento pessoal.

sentence_english: The situation is more or less under control, but we still need to stay alert for possible changes.

sentence_english: A country boy usually has a special connection with nature and rural life.

sentence_english: A funny riddle can be a great way to lighten up a conversation among friends.

sentence_english: The ceramic teapot I bought is perfect for making good tea for my friends.

sentence_english: The term placer is used to describe a location where valuable mineral deposits are found.

sentence_english: The brawl that occurred at the party left all the guests in a state of shock and concern.

sentence_english: Doubting his abilities, he hesitated to accept the challenge that was presented to him.
sentence_portuguese: Duvidando das suas capacidades, ele hesitou em aceitar o desafio que lhe foi proposto.

sentence_portuguese: O armazenamento eficiente de dados é crucial para o funcionamento de qualquer sistema informático moderno.

sentence_english: It is important to know that by paying interest, we are increasing the total cost of the loan.

sentence_english: Phone hacking is an illegal practice that can compromise people's privacy.

sentence_english: The street where I live is quite busy, especially during the rush hours in the morning and afternoon.

sentence_portuguese: A agenda da reunião foi cuidadosamente elaborada para garantir que todos os tópicos fossem abordados de forma eficaz.

sentence_english: The parish where I live has a very close-knit community and various cultural activities throughout the year.

sentence_english: The leftovers from last night's dinner were saved for today's lunch, avoiding food waste.

sentence_english: It is important not to give up on our dreams, even when we face unexpected difficulties along the way.

sentence_english: He was mocked by his classmates at school, but he learned to handle the situation maturely.

sentence_english: People are talking badly about each other, spreading rumors that can be harmful.

sentence_english: Belief in oneself is fundamental to achieving your goals in life.

sentence_portuguese: A secretária está cheia de papéis e livros que preciso organizar hoje.

sentence_english: The duck was swimming peacefully in the lake while the younger ducks followed it.
sentence_portuguese: O pato nadava tranquilamente no lago enquanto os patos mais novos o seguiam.

sentence_english: I was looking for a part-time job to supplement my monthly income.
sentence_portuguese: Estava à procura de um trabalho a tempo parcial para complementar a minha renda mensal.

sentence_english: This year's job fair will have several companies looking for new talent.
sentence_portuguese: A feira de emprego deste ano terá várias empresas à procura de novos talentos.

sentence_english: The stamps I bought at the store are very beautiful and have interesting designs.
sentence_portuguese: Os selos que comprei na loja são muito bonitos e têm designs interessantes.

sentence_english: The work office is always full of people discussing projects and collaborating as a team.
sentence_portuguese: O escritório de trabalho está sempre cheio de pessoas a discutir projetos e a colaborar em equipa.

sentence_english: The lid of the box was loose, so I had to tighten it so it wouldn't fall off.
sentence_portuguese: O tampo da caixa estava solto, então tive de apertá-lo para que não caísse.

sentence_english: I need a new piece for my car because the old one broke down.
sentence_portuguese: Preciso de uma peça nova para o meu carro, pois a antiga avariou.

sentence_english: I received an invitation to my friend's birthday party this weekend.
sentence_portuguese: Recebi um convite para a festa de aniversário do meu amigo este fim de semana.

sentence_english: The excerpt from the book I read yesterday made me think about life and its choices.
sentence_portuguese: O excerto do livro que li ontem deixou-me a pensar sobre a vida e as suas escolhas.

sentence_english: Sometimes, we need help to solve problems that seem impossible to overcome.
sentence_portuguese: Às vezes, precisamos de ajuda para resolver problemas que parecem impossíveis de ultrapassar.

sentence_english: The nature watchers noticed significant changes in animal behavior this year.
sentence_portuguese: Os observadores da natureza notaram mudanças significativas no comportamento dos animais este ano.

sentence_english: The living room was so cozy that I didn't want to leave it all night.
sentence_portuguese: A sala estava tão aconchegante que não queria sair de lá durante a noite.

sentence_english: The refusal to accept the proposal left everyone surprised by his decision.
sentence_portuguese: O recuso de aceitar a proposta deixou todos surpresos com a sua decisão.

sentence_english: It is important to take in new information to stay updated in your job.
sentence_portuguese: É importante absorver novas informações para te manteres atualizado no teu trabalho.

sentence_english: When you decide to buy a house, it's important to understand how the mortgage works.
sentence_portuguese: Quando decidires comprar uma casa, é importante entender como funciona a hipoteca.

sentence_english: The car's steering wheel was dirty, so I decided to clean it before driving.
sentence_portuguese: O volante do carro estava sujo, então decidi limpá-lo antes de conduzir.

sentence_english: In winter, it's important to wear gloves to keep your hands warm while walking on the street.
sentence_portuguese: No inverno, é importante usar luvas para manter as mãos quentes enquanto andas na rua.

sentence_english: He was alluding to a past event that we all know well.
sentence_portuguese: Ele estava aludindo a um evento passado que todos conhecemos bem.

sentence_english: At Christmas, we usually exchange gifts among friends and family to celebrate the festive season.
sentence_portuguese: No Natal, costumamos trocar prendas entre amigos e familiares para celebrar a época festiva.

sentence_english: The vacuum cleaner is essential for keeping the house clean and free of dust and dirt.
sentence_portuguese: O aspirador é essencial para manter a casa limpa e livre de pó e sujidade.

sentence_english: The song you heard yesterday is timeless and continues to touch my heart.
sentence_portuguese: A música que ouviste ontem é intemporal e continua a tocar no meu coração.

sentence_english: After a tiring week, it's nice to relax and enjoy the weekend with friends.
sentence_portuguese: Depois de uma semana cansativa, é bom folgar e aproveitar o fim de semana com amigos.

sentence_english: Christmas gifts are always a pleasant surprise for all family members.
sentence_portuguese: As prendas de Natal são sempre uma surpresa agradável para todos os membros da família.

sentence_english: The locks on the house doors are very old and need to be replaced.
sentence_portuguese: As fechaduras das portas da casa são muito antigas e precisam de ser substituídas.

sentence_english: He lifted his shirt and showed his chest full of tattoos.
sentence_portuguese: Ele levantou a camisa e mostrou o peito cheio de tatuagens.

sentence_english: Doing exercises for the biceps is important for having strength in the arms.
sentence_portuguese: Fazer exercícios para os bíceps é importante para ter força nos braços.

sentence_english: I feel surrounded by friends who support me in all difficult moments.
sentence_portuguese: Sinto-me rodeado de amigos que me apoiam em todos os momentos difíceis.

sentence_english: Besides, we need to consider other options before making a final decision.
sentence_portuguese: Além disso, precisamos considerar outras opções antes de tomar uma decisão final.

sentence_english: After using the dishes, it's important to put them away properly in the cupboard.
sentence_portuguese: Depois de usar os pratos, é importante guardá-los corretamente no armário.

sentence_english: He decided to roll up the towel before leaving the pool to avoid getting it wet.
sentence_portuguese: Ele decidiu enrolar a toalha antes de sair da piscina para não a molhar.

sentence_english: His finger was pointed in the right direction during the discussion.
sentence_portuguese: O dedo dele estava apontado para a direção certa durante a discussão.

sentence_english: I bought a pack of chewing gum to freshen my breath after lunch.
sentence_portuguese: Comprei uma embalagem de goma de mascar para refrescar o hálito depois do almoço.

sentence_english: We did a dry run to ensure everything goes well on the day of the presentation.
sentence_portuguese: Fizemos um ensaio para garantir que tudo corre bem no dia da apresentação.

sentence_english: The stairs in the building are very steep and can be dangerous for some people.
sentence_portuguese: As escadas do prédio são muito íngremes e podem ser perigosas para algumas pessoas.

sentence_english: The statue in the park is a tribute to the city's heroes.
sentence_portuguese: A estátua no parque é uma homenagem aos heróis da cidade.

sentence_english: After the heavy rain, I got home completely soaking wet and in need of a towel.
sentence_portuguese: Depois da chuva intensa, cheguei a casa completamente encharcado e a precisar de uma toalha.

sentence_english: The lobby is an important part of the political process, where decisions and policies are influenced.
sentence_portuguese: O lobby é uma parte importante do processo político, onde se influenciam decisões e políticas.

sentence_english: Be careful with emails that seem legitimate, many are scams to steal personal information.
sentence_portuguese: Cuidado com os e-mails que parecem legítimos, muitos são golpes para roubar informações pessoais.

sentence_english: Financial fraud can have serious consequences for victims and for society.
sentence_portuguese: A fraude financeira pode ter consequências graves para as vítimas e para a sociedade.

sentence_english: The new shopping center is under construction and is expected to open next year.
sentence_portuguese: O novo centro comercial está em construção e deve abrir no próximo ano.

sentence_english: The refugee found shelter in an organization that helps people in crisis situations.
sentence_portuguese: O refugiado encontrou abrigo numa organização que ajuda pessoas em situações de crise.

sentence_english: The axe is an essential tool for chopping wood and making fire.
sentence_portuguese: O machado é uma ferramenta essencial para cortar madeira e fazer fogo.

sentence_english: After smoking a bit, he got completely stoned and couldn't stop laughing.
sentence_portuguese: Depois de fumar um pouco, ele ficou completamente chapado e não conseguia parar de rir.

sentence_english: Dawn is always a magical moment when the light begins to illuminate the sky.
sentence_portuguese: O amanhecer é sempre um momento mágico, quando a luz começa a iluminar o céu.

sentence_english: The grape harvest this year was exceptional, with a quality above average.
sentence_portuguese: A colheita das uvas este ano foi excepcional, com uma qualidade superior à média.

sentence_english: The wind was blowing hard, making the trees sway and the leaves fall.
sentence_portuguese: O vento soprava forte, fazendo as árvores balançarem e as folhas caírem.

sentence_english: The blouse I bought is very pretty and has a waisted cut that flatters the body.
sentence_portuguese: A blusa que comprei é muito bonita e tem um corte com cintura que valoriza o corpo.

sentence_english: After a few beers, he got completely drunk and started telling funny stories.
sentence_portuguese: Depois de algumas cervejas, ele ficou completamente bêbado e começou a contar histórias engraçadas.

sentence_english: If you don't pay attention, you might mess up everything you planned for the weekend.
sentence_portuguese: Se não prestares atenção, podes estragar tudo o que planeaste para o fim de semana.

sentence_english: I don't understand what you're trying to say, can you explain better?
sentence_portuguese: Não percebo o que estás a tentar dizer, podes explicar melhor?

sentence_english: I don't want to mess up your work, but I need help with this task.
sentence_portuguese: Não quero trapalhar o teu trabalho, mas preciso de ajuda com esta tarefa.

sentence_english: The right tools can make all the difference when it comes to completing a project.
sentence_portuguese: As ferramentas certas podem fazer toda a diferença na hora de realizar um projeto.

sentence_english: The scene in the movie was so thrilling that everyone was silent watching.
sentence_portuguese: A cena do filme foi tão emocionante que todos ficaram em silêncio a assistir.

sentence_english: After everything that happened, I feel heartbroken and don't know what to do.
sentence_portuguese: Depois de tudo o que aconteceu, sinto-me com o coração partido e sem saber o que fazer.

sentence_english: He was in an emotional limbo, not knowing what to do with his life.
sentence_portuguese: Ele estava num limbo emocional, sem saber o que fazer com a sua vida.

sentence_english: Ingesting healthy foods is essential for maintaining good health and energy throughout the day.
sentence_portuguese: Ingerindo alimentos saudáveis é fundamental para manter uma boa saúde e energia ao longo do dia.

sentence_english: The highlights of the meeting were discussed with all team members.
sentence_portuguese: Os destaques da reunião foram discutidos com todos os membros da equipa.

sentence_english: He fell ill suddenly and had to miss work for a week.
sentence_portuguese: Ele adoeceu de repente e teve de faltar ao trabalho durante uma semana.

sentence_english: The dress I bought is so tight that I can hardly breathe.
sentence_portuguese: O vestido que comprei está tão apertado que mal consigo respirar.

sentence_english: Today, it's snowing and the streets are covered with a white blanket.
sentence_portuguese: Hoje, está a nevar e as ruas estão cobertas de um manto branco.

sentence_english: It is important to maintain vigor and energy throughout the day to be productive.
sentence_portuguese: É importante manter o vigor e a energia ao longo do dia para ser produtivo.

sentence_english: The clouds in the sky were so beautiful they looked hand-painted.
sentence_portuguese: As nuvens no céu estavam tão bonitas que pareciam pintadas à mão.

sentence_english: Before buying, it's important to see the label to know the ingredients.
sentence_portuguese: Antes de comprar, é importante ver o rótulo para saber os ingredientes.

sentence_english: The side of the box is damaged and we need a new one to replace it.
sentence_portuguese: A lateral da caixa está danificada e precisamos de uma nova para substituir.

sentence_english: Sometimes, I need someone to help me scratch my back when I can't reach.
sentence_portuguese: Às vezes, preciso de alguém para me ajudar a coçar as minhas costas quando não consigo alcançar.

sentence_english: The glazier installed the new windows in the house in just one day.
sentence_portuguese: A vidraceira instalou as novas janelas na casa em apenas um dia.

sentence_english: The charging cable for my phone broke and I need a new one.
sentence_portuguese: O cabo de carregamento do meu telemóvel avariou e preciso de um novo.

sentence_english: Be careful with the candle, don't let it burn unattended.
sentence_portuguese: Cuidado com a vela, não a deixes queimar sem supervisão.

sentence_english: The survey revealed that most people prefer to work remotely.
sentence_portuguese: A sondagem revelou que a maioria das pessoas prefere trabalhar remotamente.

sentence_english: The pepper mill is essential to enhance the flavor of the dishes you cook.
sentence_portuguese: O moedor de pimenta é essencial para realçar o sabor dos pratos que cozinhas.

sentence_english: You need to dare to step out of your comfort zone to grow in life.
sentence_portuguese: É preciso atrever-se a sair da zona de conforto para crescer na vida.

sentence_english: Oat milk is a popular alternative to cow's milk among vegans.
sentence_portuguese: O leite de aveia é uma alternativa popular ao leite de vaca entre os vegans.
